verses.verse: Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came unto me, saying<WH559>,
Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, set<WH7760> thy face<WH6440> against mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165>, and prophesy<WH5012> against it,

And say<WH559> unto it, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, O mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165>, I am against thee, and I will stretch out<WH5186> mine hand<WH3027> against thee, and I will make<WH5414> thee most<WH4923> desolate<WH8077>. most: Heb. desolation and desolation
I will lay<WH7760> thy cities<WH5892> waste<WH2723>, and thou shalt be desolate<WH8077>, and thou shalt know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.

Because thou hast had a perpetual<WH5769> hatred<WH342>, and hast shed<WH5064> the blood of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> by the force<WH3027> of the sword<WH2719> in the time<WH6256> of their calamity<WH343>, in the time<WH6256> that their iniquity<WH5771> had an end<WH7093>: perpetual: or, hatred of old shed: Heb. poured out the children force: Heb. hands

Therefore, as I live<WH2416>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>, I will prepare<WH6213> thee unto blood<WH1818>, and blood<WH1818> shall pursue<WH7291> thee: sith<WH518> thou hast not hated<WH8130> blood<WH1818>, even blood<WH1818> shall pursue<WH7291> thee.

Thus will I make<WH5414> mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165> most<WH8077> desolate<WH8077>, and cut off<WH3772> from it him that passeth out<WH5674> and him that returneth<WH7725>. most: Heb. desolation and desolation

And I will fill<WH4390> his mountains<WH2022> with his slain<WH2491> men: in thy hills<WH1389>, and in thy valleys<WH1516>, and in all thy rivers<WH650>, shall they fall<WH5307> that are slain<WH2491> with the sword<WH2719>.
I will make<WH5414> thee perpetual<WH5769> desolations<WH8077>, and thy cities<WH5892> shall not return<WH7725> <WH3427>: and ye shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.

Because thou hast said<WH559>, These two<WH8147> nations<WH1471> and these two<WH8147> countries<WH776> shall be mine, and we will possess<WH3423> it; whereas the LORD<WH3068> was there: whereas: or, though the LORD was there

Therefore, as I live<WH2416>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>, I will even do<WH6213> according to thine anger<WH639>, and according to thine envy<WH7068> which thou hast used<WH6213> out of thy hatred<WH8135> against them; and I will make myself known<WH3045> among them, when I have judged<WH8199> thee.

And thou shalt know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>, and that I have heard<WH8085> all thy blasphemies<WH5007> which thou hast spoken<WH559> against the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, They are laid desolate<WH8074> <WH8077>, they are given<WH5414> us to consume<WH402>. to consume: Heb. to devour
Thus with your mouth<WH6310> ye have boasted<WH1431> against me, and have multiplied<WH6280> your words<WH1697> against me: I have heard<WH8085> them. boasted: Heb. magnified
Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; When the whole earth<WH776> rejoiceth<WH8055>, I will make<WH6213> thee desolate<WH8077>.

As thou didst rejoice<WH8057> at the inheritance<WH5159> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, because it was desolate<WH8074>, so will I do<WH6213> unto thee: thou shalt be desolate<WH8077>, O mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165>, and all Idumea<WH123>, even all of it: and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.
